headline: LinkSquares Appoints Kellie Snyder as Chief Customer Officer
summary: LinkSquares, the leader in AI-powered Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM) solutions, proudly announces the appointment of Kellie Snyder as Chief Customer Officer. Snyder brings exceptional global leadership experience and a proven track record of scaling customer success organizations to drive customer value, retention and financial growth.
